title: Club tags ingame
body:
For some reason i dont see anymore name of clubs on top of myself and other players in-game o0.


is it only me?
i am that stupid that i couldn't find how to show them? o0

Im a club leader maybe thats the problem? o0

replies.body: Ahhhhh this weird bug. Every once and awhile club leaders can't see their club, but if we search the club and poke around a bit it repairs that link. Shoot me the club you should be able to see, and I'll be able to work mah poro magic!
my club name is LSD is good
Alrighty, looks like everything is good on the backend of things between your account and that club. You should be able to go into your profile and toggle showing the club tag.
No i still cannot see my tag or anyone else tag

It's been like this for a long time. Apparently they were going to increase club member cap and I'm assuming tags will be fixed by then. But it's taking much longer than it should take. Hopefully rito will address this issue if they already haven't gave us an update on it.
